title: 10-Nen Buri Ni Saikai Shita Kusogaki Wa Seijun Bishoujo Jk Ni Seichou Shiteita
alternative_title: 10年ぶりに再会したクソガキは清純美少女JKに成長していた ; The Brat I Hadn't Seen in 10 Years Turned into a Pure, Beautiful High School Girl. ; La mocosa que no había visto en 10 años se convirtió en una pura y hermosa chica de secundaria
status: 10年ぶりに再会したクソガキは清純美少女JKに成長していた ; The Brat I Hadn't Seen in 10 Years Turned into a Pure, Beautiful High School Girl. ; La mocosa que no había visto en 10 años se convirtió en una pura y hermosa chica de secundaria
description:
Description :
        Yuu Arizuki returned to his hometown after quitting his job at an black company in Tokyo. Just as he was getting ready to start a new life back home, he met a beautiful and innocent JK girl, who turned out to be Haruyama Miya, one of the little girls (brats) Isamu used to play with when he was young. But Isamu didn't recognize her because of how much she had changed after growing up...?
